data.subject: Apathy In The UK
data.lyric:
Queuing in the cold since half past four
 Want to be the first ones through the door
 We were eager

data.subject: The Hammer Of Witches
data.lyric:

 The cleansing of all evil through hypocrisy
 A persecution

data.subject: The House Of Bedlem
data.lyric:
Restrained and manacled, an ashen figure starved of sun
 A place where good men die like dogs
 Confu

data.subject: Just Add Nauseam
data.lyric:
Coating our bodies with ashes
 as we dwell in cremation grounds
 A corpse devouring ritual
 breaking

data.subject: Non Serviam
data.lyric:
Compliance
 Or choose defiance
 Show no alliance
 You don't have to follow suit
 
 I will not serve

data.subject: Surrounded by Skulls
data.lyric:
Closing the struggle for sense and reason
 Your eyes are wide open but you're still not seeing
 Doom
